fields.description: The reference ID for the Severance Matrix.
Indicates the minimum value of the compensation basis range to determine eligibility for this matrix band.
Indicates the maximum value of the compensation basis range to determine eligibility for this matrix band.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
This indicates the duration for a Duration type entry only.
This indicates the minimum recommendation for the duration or length of service for the entry.
This indicates the maximum recommendation for the duration/length of service for the entry.
Returns the Severance Matrix with the name specified by this parameter.
Filtering options to specify the type of matrix to be returned.
If true, inactive matrices will be included in the returned set. If false, inactive matrices will not be included.

Duration.description: This indicates the duration for a Duration type entry only.

Eligibility_Rule_Reference_Condition_Rul.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Eligibility_Rule_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

EnhancedSeveranceMatrix_Enhanced_Severan.description: The reference ID for the Severance Matrix.

Enhanced_Severance_Matrix_Filter_Options.description: Filtering options to specify the type of matrix to be returned.

Include_Inactive_Prompt.description: If true, inactive matrices will be included in the returned set. If false, inactive matrices will not be included.

Maximum_Compensation_Basis_Range.description: Indicates the maximum value of the compensation basis range to determine eligibility for this matrix band.

Maximum_Duration.description: This indicates the maximum recommendation for the duration/length of service for the entry.

Minimum_Compensation_Basis_Range.description: Indicates the minimum value of the compensation basis range to determine eligibility for this matrix band.

Minimum_Duration.description: This indicates the minimum recommendation for the duration or length of service for the entry.

Name_Prompt.description: Returns the Severance Matrix with the name specified by this parameter.
